title: Part A
stimulusHtml:

Area= ∫ −3 3 ( 20 1+ x 2 −2 ) dx=37.961 or 37.962 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5654@

1 point is earned for the correct limits in an integral in (a), (b), or (c)

20 1+ x 2 =2 when x=±3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@467B@
